name: Style On 'Em
description:
A turn-based fighting game where the most stylish player wins!

In Style On 'Em players are reward points for performing flashy moves such as chains of attacks, and dodging enemy attacks. The winner isn't the last player standing, but instead the player with the most points.

Sound effects courtesy of 3rd Note Inc.'s (Free) Retro SFX Pack which can be found on the Unity Asset Store.

Animations courtesy of Mixamo (found on their website & the Unity Asset Store), and Explosive's RPG Character and Free Fighter Bundles which can be found on the Unity Asset Store.
